title: Is this Eagle Book?
author: zerimar3

comments.content:
I'm seeing [Eagle FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/eagle) as well, Book or Bold.  
Some close alternatives: [Resolute NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/resolute-nf), [Recovery](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typetrust/recovery), [Metalworker JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/metalworker)
Thank you Ryuk, it's always a pleasure to hear from you.
